user_question: What are the most Earth-like exoplanets discovered so far, and can you generate an image of one of them?
final_answer: The most Earth-like exoplanets discovered so far include Kepler-452b, Proxima Centauri b, and TRAPPIST-1e. Image of Kepler-452b generated. Kepler-452b is believed to have a thick atmosphere, possibly with clouds and active volcanism, but specific details are not yet confirmed.
